pages.text: Flare is a creature that doesn't summon normally.$(br2)You have to hit a Phantom with a Splash $(l:patchouli:potions/upgrade_aquatic/insomnia)Potion of Insomnia$(/l) or with a Arrow of Insomnia to transform it to a Flare.$(br2)This creature will attack Phantoms, so you can use them to defend your base of those annoying creatures.
On death, like the Phantom, Flares may drop Phantom Membrane.
